<h1 align="center" style="font-weight: 900;">
  Blog for Richard Oluwo
</h1>

I intend to write all my unfiltered thoughts here.
For you to actually view the blog, you'll need to head over to [Richard Oluwo's Blog](https://blog.richardoluwo.ga),
Built with Gatsby Js and Graphql and greatly inspired by Dan Abramov's blog at [Overreacted.io](https://overreacted.io)
though not as beautiful. I shall make design updates but you're stuck with fofr now lol.

You may want to check out my main portfolio [Richard Oluwo](https://www.richardoluwo.ga)
